title: #168: Surviving Dirty John - Debra Newell Part 2
description:
Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti continue their discussion with Debra Newell. We talk about Debra's exit strategy and give a voice to Cindi Vickers (nee Newell), Debra's sister, who was abused and shot dead by Billy, her husband, when she tried to leave him on March 8 1984.


#HerNameISDebraNewell

#HerNameWasCindiVickers

#DirtyJohn

#CoerciveControl

#Stalking


More Information about Coercive Control

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/coercive-control/


Advice if you believe someone you know is being abused

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/advice-if-you-believe-someone-else-is-being-abused/


Domestic Abuse, Stalking and Harassment and Honour Based Violence (DASH) Risk Model

https://www.dashriskchecklist.co.uk/v-dash/


Serial stalkers and abusers should be on a national register. If you agree please sign @laurarichards99 @paladinservice petition https://www.change.org/p/rt-hon-theresa-may-mp-create-a-stalker-s-register
